name: Oven Roasted Buffalo Potato Wedges
description: Not just for wings! The Buffalo flavours of cayenne pepper, garlic, onion, herbs and spices make a delicious seasoning for potatoes. Not to mention, these potato wedges have much lower sodium than the pre-made frozen French fries you would pick up at the store, or what you would get with takeout. Dunk them in your favourite prepared Epicure Dip or Aioli and enjoy!
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, coat potato wedges in oil. Add seasoning.
Toss well to coat. Place in a single layer on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
tips: To slash cooking time, microwave wedges in Multipurpose Steamer on high, covered, for 5 min to soften before tossing with oil and seasoning and roasting.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein, 1 cup chopped veggies, and 2 tbsp prepared Epicure Dip.
